title: IBM watsonx Code Assistant
introduction: IBM watsonx Code Assistant is a portfolio of generative AI products for code and content creation. You can use pretrained models based on specific programming languages to generate code with trust, security, and compliance.

links.title: Setting up your watsonx Code Assistant service in IBM Cloud

section_highlights.title: Introducing the new IBM watsonx Code Assistant
section_highlights.description: IBM is launching a versatile generative AI tool that supports multiple programming languages

section_highlights.title: AI agents vs. AI assistants
section_highlights.description: Explore the differences, similarities, benefits and risks of AI assistants and AI agents
